# Generated by iptables-save v1.8.7 on Thu May  5 00:18:57 2022
*filter
:INPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:FORWARD ACCEPT [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
-A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 22 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 23 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -d 192.168.100.101/32 -p tcp -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 192.168.100.0/24 -p tcp -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -d 192.168.100.101/32 -p tcp -j DROP
-A FORWARD -d 192.168.100.101/32 -p tcp -j ACCEPT
-A FORWARD -j ACCEPT
-A OUTPUT ! -d 192.168.100.101/32 -p tcp -j ACCEPT
-A OUTPUT -d 192.168.100.101/32 -p tcp -j ACCEPT
-A OUTPUT -d 192.168.100.101/32 -p tcp -j ACCEPT
COMMIT
# Completed on Thu May  5 00:18:57 2022
# Generated by iptables-save v1.8.7 on Thu May  5 00:18:57 2022
*nat
:PREROUTING ACCEPT [0:0]
:INPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:POSTROUTING ACCEPT [0:0]
-A INPUT -d 192.168.100.101/32 -p tcp -j ACCEPT
-A OUTPUT -d 192.168.100.101/32 -p tcp -j ACCEPT
COMMIT
# Completed on Thu May  5 00:18:57 2022
